creator: jochen.stiepel@dresdner-bank.com
text:
I have  3 "Add user" and 5 "Add Variable", but not all users have all 
variables, some left blank. I saved it and the next time I opened the .jmx file 
with JMeter I get the error "Problem loading part of file" and he could not 
load "User Parameter" and wrote into the log.txt:

org.apache.avalon.framework.configuration.ConfigurationException: No value is 
associated with the configuration element "string" at :54:10
	at 
org.apache.avalon.framework.configuration.DefaultConfiguration.getValue
(DefaultConfiguration.java:164)
	at org.apache.jmeter.save.SaveService.createCollection
(SaveService.java:363)
	at org.apache.jmeter.save.SaveService.createCollection
(SaveService.java:359)
	at org.apache.jmeter.save.SaveService.createTestElement
(SaveService.java:335)
	at org.apache.jmeter.save.SaveService.generateNode(SaveService.java:374)
	at org.apache.jmeter.save.SaveService.generateNode(SaveService.java:390)
	at org.apache.jmeter.save.SaveService.generateNode(SaveService.java:390)
	at org.apache.jmeter.save.SaveService.loadSubTree(SaveService.java:284)
	at org.apache.jmeter.gui.action.Load.doAction(Load.java:137)
	at org.apache.jmeter.gui.action.ActionRouter.actionPerformed
(ActionRouter.java:100)

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
